answers.answer: It's just hard right now, you're getting used to this new way of life. Just make sure she tests her blood, and knows the right insulin dose to give, and the amount of carbs she's eating... her blood sugar should stabilize soon.

question: My now 8 year old daughter was diagnosed 4 months ago with Type 1 Diabetes when she was 7 years old.  We have been experiencing highs and lows all the time and I feel like we are getting nowhere with regulating it.  How long will it take for it to become somewhat regulated?  Or will it ever become that?
title: Ever normal again...???
